## 1. Install R v4.5.1 (Latest)

Please, download the latest R version based on the system you use.

-   [**Download R for Windows**](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/){target="_blank"}

-   [**Download R for Linux**](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/linux/){target="_blank"}

-   [**Download R for macOS**](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/macosx/){target="_blank"}

## 2. Install RStudio (Latest)

After downloading R, please download RStudio from following link.

-   [**Download RStudio**](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download){target="_blank"}

## 3. Install R packages

Please, install following packages only if you're able to.

For this, Open RStudio \> Go to R console \> Copy/paste following codes.

```         

install.packages("remotes"); remotes::install_github("bjungbogati/rsetup");
```
